quote: Zed : Penguins, such fascinating creatures, but I didn’t know you were studying them. What class is that you’re taking?Sky: The ‘we-stupid-looking-creature-should-stick-together’ class.
quote_letters: ZED PENGUINS SUCH FASCINATING CREATURES BUT I DIDNT KNOW YOU WERE STUDYING THEM WHAT CLASS IS THAT YOURE TAKINGSKY THE WE-STUPID-LOOKING-CREATURE-SHOULD-STICK-TOGETHER CLASS
